snippet: Joey Logano earned a critical win at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., to move into the third round of Nascar’s playoffs in the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
abstract: Joey Logano wins at Charlotte Motor Speedway and secures spot in third round of playoff for Sprint Cup.
lead_paragraph: Joey Logano earned a critical win at Charlotte Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., to move into the third round of Nascar’s playoffs in the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
